groups.name: application
groups.description: The settings of the CloudWork Back Application for file storage.

properties.name: application.front-url
properties.description: The host where the front application operates from.

properties.name: application.token-header
properties.description: The header name which carries an authorization token from the front app.

properties.name: application.token-prefix
properties.description: The prefix preceding the token itself in an appropriate header string.
